1. Mounting the EBFM storage location

sudo apt-get install portmap nfs-common

sudo mount nfstas01-hba:/ebfm /home/ebfm/

2. CSIRO Matlab lib

sudo mount nfstas01-hba:/proj1/toolbox/ /home/csiroToolbox/

(remember to addpath in matlab)
